Description: GIBSON LES PAUL VOODOO GUITAR Made in a limited run from 2002-2004, the Les Paul Voodoo features a swamp ash body, ebony fret board, 496R & 500T pickups, and a red voodoo skull inlay. This is a used guitar that has been well cared for. Please note in the photos that there is a hairline crack in the front of the head (see pics). The case is also original and is in very good condition. The lock has never been used and still has the plastic pin in it. There are some scratches on the top front (see pics). I bought this guitar in 2004 and it has been in my possession the entire time. Because of the hairline crack I am willing to part with it at a discount. Shipping is $65.00 Shipping will include insurance to protect both buyer and seller. Title: GIBSON Les Paul VOODOO 2003 Ebony w Red Skull Guitar
